dialogStrings: Temple of the Ancients

{Cloud}
“I guess there's no way we can open it…
We'll come back later.”

{Cloud}
“It's warm…”

{Cloud}
“This isn't good…”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}…
…behind you.”

{Cait Sith}
“Sorry to keep you waiting!!
It's Me!!”

{Cait Sith}
“I'll handle the rest!”

{Cait Sith}
“Well, everyone…
Take care of yourselves!”

{Aeris}
“{Cait Sith}…”

{Aeris}
“Come on, {Cloud}…
Say something.”

{Cloud}
“I'm not good at this.”

{Cait Sith}
“Mmm, I understand.
I feel the same too.”

{Aeris}
“Why don't you read
our fortunes?”

{Cait Sith}
“Say, that's right…
I haven't done it in a while, huh?”{PAUSE}“I'm so exited.
Right or wrong,
I'm still the same 'ol me”{PAUSE}“Now, what should I predict?”

{Aeris}
“Hmm, let's see how compatible
{Cloud} and I are!”

{Cait Sith}
“That'll cost ya.
Exactly one date!”

{Cait Sith}
“Here I go!”

{Cait Sith}
“This isn't good. I can't say it.”{PAUSE}“Poor {Tifa}.”

{Aeris}
“No!
Tell me!”{PAUSE}“I promise I won't get mad!”

{Cait Sith}
“Is that so?
Then I'll tell you.”{PAUSE}“Looks good.
You are perfect for each other!”{PAUSE}“{Aeris}'s star and
{Cloud}'s star!
They show a great future!”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}, I'll be your matchmaker,
preacher…
I'll do whatever you want me to!”{PAUSE}“You just call me when it all happens!”

{Cait Sith}
“Thank you for believing in me,
knowing that I was a spy.”{PAUSE}“This is the final, final farewell!”

{Aeris}
“Be strong
{Cait Sith}!!”
